revision.text:
[[File:WaterStone.jpg|thumb|200px|The Water Stone]]
==Details==
===Description=== The Water Stone costs 2,500 [[Quest Points]]. It can be bought from the [[shops]] of [[Shops#Kanto:_Locations_and_items|Cerulean City]] in [[Kanto]] and [[Shops#Hoenn:_Locations_and_items|Sootopolis City]] in [[Hoenn]]. It can also be mined from the [[Underground]].
===Uses===
{| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !! Evolution |- | [[File:Poliwhirl.png|40px]] Poliwhirl || [[File:Poliwrath.png|40px]] Poliwrath |- | [[File:Shellder.png|40px]] Shellder || [[File:Cloyster.png|40px]] Cloyster |- | [[File:Staryu.png|40px]] Staryu || [[File:Starmie.png|40px]] Starmie |- | [[File:Eevee.png|40px]] Eevee || [[File:Vaporeon.png|40px]] Vaporeon |- | [[File:Lombre.png|40px]] Lombre || [[File:Ludicolo.png|40px]] Ludicolo |- | [[File:Panpour.png|40px]] Panpour || [[File:Simipour.png|40px]] Simipour |}
